org.sensorhub.api.common

Class EntityEvent<EventTypeEnum extends Enum<?>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sensorhub.api.common.Event<EventTypeEnum>
      • org.sensorhub.api.common.EntityEvent<EventTypeEnum>
  • Type Parameters:
    EventTypeEnum - Enum of possible event sub-type
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DataEvent, FoiEvent, SensorControlEvent, SensorEvent

    public abstract class EntityEvent<EventTypeEnum extends Enum<?>>
extends Event<EventTypeEnum>

    Base class for all events that relates to a particular entity.
    An entity in SensorHub can be a sensor, a process, etc. and this type of event is useful when it is related to a particular entity within a group such as a sensor network or a process grid.

    Since:
    Apr 23, 2015
    Author:
    Alex Robin

    • Method Detail

      • getRelatedEntityID

        public String getRelatedEntityID()
        Gets the unique ID of the entity related to this event.
        For group of entities (e.g. sensor networks), it will be either the ID of the group as a whole (if the event is global) or the ID of a single entity within the group (if the event applies only to that entity)
        Returns:
        Unique ID of related entity
